Unknown.translation: My beloved master used to feel pleased seeing my forehead. Adoring it, he used to put mark of consecration on it and ask me to see it.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: myry iesy m`Qy nUM dyK ky pRwdwˆ dy suAwmI pRsMn huMdy sn qy Awpxy h`QIˆ ies auqy bxw ky iqlk lw idKwauˆdy huMdy sn[

lines.gurmukhi: XwhI msqk Dwir hsq kml ipRX; pRym kiQ kiQ kih mwnn mnwvqy [

Unknown.translation: My beloved then used to keep her soft hands on my forehead and with loving stories used to please me-the arrogant one.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iesy m`Qy qy ipAwry jI Awpxy koml h`Q r`K ky ipAwr dIAwˆ g`lwˆ kih kih ky mYˆ mwC m`qI nUM mnwauˆdy huMdy sn[

lines.gurmukhi: XwhI msqk nwhI nwhI kir BwgqI hI; Dwie Dwie hyq kir aurih lgwvqy [

Unknown.translation: I used to run away saying No! No! and chasing me, he used to hug me very lovingly resting my forehead on his chest.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iPr jdoˆ mYˆ nhIˆ nhIˆ krdI B`j jwˆdI swˆ qwˆ auh Awp dOV dOV ky ipAwr krdy hoey iesy m`Qy nUM AwpxI CwqI nwl lwauˆdy huMdy sn[

lines.gurmukhi: soeI msqk Duin Duin pun roie auTON; sÍpny hU nwQ nwih drs idKwvqy [576[

Unknown.translation: But now on separation, I lament and cry with the same forehead, but my beloved master does not even appear in my dreams.  (576)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iPr auho m`Qw hux Dun Dun ky ro auTdI hwˆ, pr ipAwry pRwx pqI jI supny ivc BI drSn nhIˆ idKwˆdy ]576]
